entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow or ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
